Thunder and two friends brought equipment into the jungle of a foreign country and fought several times. Save the son, but the brother becomes a hostage. At the scene of the strangulation, Thunder was willing to change her life. At this time, a woman he had saved appeared. It turned out that she was the boss of the hunting and killing organization. Was she acquainted or not saved? Or, in the face of the red-eye bad guy, can she turn the tide?
title: Thunder Chase
